name: Swarm of Bats
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned, unconscious

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 0 ft.  one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage  or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm is bloodied.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can't use blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The swarm has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creatures space and move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. It can't gain hit points or temporary hit points.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
